snippet.title: Kobe, Lakers, and Dwight Howard: Antisocial media
snippet.description: The minute Dwight Howard decides to leave the Lakers for Houston, he is unfollowed on Twitter by Kobe Bryant. Then an Instagram account purporting to be that of the Lakers' Jodie Meeks posts a pic of Howard as a woman.

snippet.title: Kobe plays shooting guard in new Call Of Duty ad
snippet.description: The launch ad for "Call of Duty: Black Ops" sees people in their everyday clothes shooting people with everyday guns. Among them are Kobe Bryant and Jimmy Kimmel.

snippet.title: Intel's Bryant set to become chairman
snippet.description: Intel says Andy Bryant has become vice chairman and will become its new chairman in May of next year.

snippet.title: Intel's Andy Bryant gets promoted, in a sense
snippet.description: The chip-maker's longtime CFO is set to become something called Chief Administrative Officer, which sounds like something out of "Office Space" but actually still reports to the CEO.

snippet.title: New Call of Duty ad will star Megan Fox
snippet.description: In a first for the franchise, a female celebrity takes on the lead role in a new ad for Call of Duty: Ghosts. It's gaming emancipation.

snippet.title: Here's Megan Fox showing her Call of Duty during a 'Hangover'
snippet.description: The Call of Duty: Ghosts ad is released. Yes, boys will be boys and Megan Fox will put up with them -- at least for a moment.

snippet.title: Why AT&T's Next iPhone ad is the greatest ever iPhone ad
snippet.description: Though some hate it, AT&T's ad for its Next plan is the last word in gadget obsession above all things. And AT&T says the plan is exceeding expectations.

snippet.title: Twitter's new #FollowMe video app creates the ultimate selfie
snippet.description: A video app with a twist, #FollowMe tells the story of you based on your tweets, photos, and Vine videos.

snippet.title: The technology behind NBA 2K13
snippet.description: Brian Tong goes behind the scenes with the critically acclaimed NBA 2K13 to check the tech behind the latest entries in one of the best sports video game franchises.

snippet.title: Jeremy Lin crushing it as overnight Twitter star
snippet.description: Few people outside of his friends and family ever heard of him a week ago. Now he's turned into a sports (and Twitter) phenom.
